channel.title: Don't have a clue on how to even start this [317]
channel.description:
I'm not a noob, but I'm very confused on this, I don't even know where to start.
My players can follow each other through walls, and auto-retaliate attacks monsters in the water if they're ranging/maging and then they get stuck. I was wondering how I can fix this, It's really an annoyance to my server.
